page.title: 07BIGGER SCHOOLS NEAR MILTON.
page.content: Education in the east of our block is provided by Methilhill and Balcurvie Primary Schools and Buckhaven High School.Milton children went to Markinch or Balcurvie Schools when they were 12, but now the 15 teenagers go to{Auchmuty High School,} Glenrothes.Balcurvie and Methilhill pupils move to{Kirkland High}and Buckhaven.Balcurvie,with 5 rooms and 4 teachers,has 88 children.Methilhill,60 years old,has 20 rooms,454 pupils and 16 teachers.A headteacher and two assistant headteachers do not teach. {Buckhaven High School}was built in 1957 to replace the 1860 one in old Buckhaven.The 1647 pupils,who may stay there 6 years,have 117 teachers.A Special Education Unit for mentally handicapped pupils,is at this High School which has an indoor swimming pool and extensive playing fields.
